description: Pant was batting against Indian throwdown specialists when he copped the blow and was seen grimacing in pain.

title: 'Exposing my identity': Unnao rape survivor pleads for help; blames Sengar's daughters
description: The Unnao rape survivor has appealed for support. She claims Kuldeep Singh Sengar's daughters and their supporters are revealing her identity on social media. This puts her safety at risk. The Supreme Court has stayed a High Court order granting bail to Sengar. The survivor's mother welcomed the Supreme Court's decision.

'77 deaths due to SIR': Mamata makes shock claim; attacks EC again
description: West Bengal CM Mamata Banerjee has strongly condemned the ongoing Special Intensive Revision (SIR) in the state, alleging it has led to 77 deaths and numerous hospitalizations. She criticized the Election Commission of India (ECI) for a "relentlessly harassing" and "unplanned" process that lacks human judgment and social sensitivity, particularly impacting women voters and prominent citizens.

title: Warning sent! Sooryavanshi's carnage turns heads - watch
description: Fourteen-year-old Vaibhav Sooryavanshi dazzled in India U19’s World Cup warm-up against Scotland, smashing 96 off 50 balls to power India to 374/8. Opening the innings, the left-hander mixed precision with power, striking nine fours and seven sixes. His fearless, fluent knock and rapid partnership with Aaron George sent a clear warning to rivals.

Broad daylight murder in Delhi: Woman shot in head; cops probe link to 2023 husband’s killing
description: Rachna Yadav, president of Shalimar Bagh's RWA, was shot dead in broad daylight. The incident, occurring around 11 am, is believed to be linked to the murder of her husband in Bhalswa village last year. Police are investigating the case as murder, with personal rivalry and old enmity as primary lines of inquiry.

While Stree 2 saw more on its equivalent day due to cinema day, Dhurandhar's weekend might outperform it. The Raja Saab could experience a weekend drop due to mixed reviews and word-of-mouth.

Pakistan pacer's action questioned in BBL! Warner warns umpires - watch
description: Pakistan pacer Zaman Khan came under scrutiny in the Big Bash League after David Warner questioned his slingshot bowling action during a match. Warner raised concerns with umpires after scoring 82. Zaman struggled in his debut for Brisbane Heat, conceding 32 runs, though Heat won comfortably. The incident revived memories of Muhammad Hasnain’s past action controversy.

T20 World Cup snub: Gill turns to 'destiny'; responds to exclusion from squad
description: The 26-year-old was not picked for the T20 World Cup despite leading India in the longer formats. Gill has played 36 T20Is, scoring 869 runs at an average of 28.03 and a strike rate of 138.59. He was dropped from the T20 setup after managing 291 runs in his last 15 matches in the format at an average of 24.25.

title: Garbage avalanche: Death toll rises in Philippines landfill collapse; 34 feared trapped
description: A devastating landfill collapse in the Philippines has claimed at least four lives, with dozens still missing. Rescue efforts are underway in Cebu city, where workers are feared trapped beneath tons of debris. Authorities are investigating ground instability and heavy rainfall as potential causes for the disaster, which has evoked memories of a similar tragedy.

description: Olympic star Neeraj Chopra has ended his coaching partnership with javelin legend Jan Zelezny after a successful year. Chopra credited Zelezny for helping him surpass the 90-meter mark and expressed admiration for his idol. Both athletes highlighted their positive relationship and plan to stay in touch. Chopra now aims for greater control over his training as he targets future championships.

'Technical snag detected': Small aircraft crashes near Odisha's airstrip; pilot sustains injuries
description: A small aircraft executed an emergency belly landing approximately nine kilometers from Rourkela airstrip due to a mid-flight technical fault. While all passengers emerged safely, the pilot sustained serious injuries and was transported to a hospital for medical attention. The pilot's quick thinking in spotting an open grassland prevented further casualties.

title: Amazon to H-1B employees working in India: You can't code or sign; full list of dont's
description: Amazon is allowing employees stranded in India due to H-1B visa delays to work remotely until March 2. However, strict restrictions prevent them from coding, making strategic decisions, or interacting with customers. These limitations, reportedly due to local laws, significantly hinder core job functions, leaving many engineers questioning their productivity.

description: Google co-founders Sergey Brin and Larry Page have moved a key entity out of California to Delaware, ahead of a potential 5% wealth tax. This move, with Reno, Nevada listed as the principal office, comes as the state considers a retroactive tax on billionaires.
